generated_description: home-rail's, legally known as calgary glass railing home rail ltd., is a company based in calgary, alberta. the company specializes in the design, engineering, and installation of aluminum railing systems, including picket and glass railing, as well as vinyl and composite decking. home-rail's products are compliant with the national building code of canada and feature a high-density powder-coated finish that meets aama 2603 standards. the company also offers modular lightweight aluminum railing solutions and provides a fully stocked warehouse for diy enthusiasts.
